titles: Upon the late lamentable fire in London in an humble imitation of the most incomparable Mr. Cowley his Pindarick strain / by J.A. of Kings-Colledge in Camb., Fellow.
author: Allison, John, 1644 or 5-1683.
notes: Attributed to John Allison. Cf. Wing.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
